title: BONUS: Velvet's Edge Cassidy Bentley, Wife Of Dierks Bentley on How To Teach Young Girls They Are Beautiful
itunes:title: BONUS: Velvet's Edge Cassidy Bentley, Wife Of Dierks Bentley on How To Teach Young Girls They Are Beautiful
description:
If you enjoy this episode, Subscribe + Follow 'Velvet's Edge with Kelly Henderson' wherever you listen to podcasts or tap/click HERE.


Kelly records a phone call with dear friend, Cassidy Bentley asking for advice on teaching young girls they are beautiful as they are. Cassidy shares two daughters with country music star, Dierks Bentley and Kelly is now dating a man with two young daughters. Kelly asks Cassidy advice on finding the balance between feeling good on the outside while teaching the girls to love who they are on the inside. The women also discuss their own personal insecurities and inner critics that having young girls around has made them face. 


socials:
